categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic

nodes.text: B4-CO was an astromech droid in service of the Sith Empire around the time of the Invasion of Ziost in 3636 BBY.

B4-CO appears in the game files for Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan under npc.daily_area.ziost.ambient category. Originally intended as a transportation service for the Ziost storyline, he was replaced with a simple terminal in the live version of the game.
